SEARCH
Package Presentation

Class TransitionViewController

java.lang.Object
Presentation.TransitionViewController
public class TransitionViewController extends Object
The TransitionViewController class is responsible for managing transitions in the presentation layer. It acts as a bridge between the GUI and the PresentationController, handling operations related to transitions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TransitionViewController(PresentationController presentationController)
    Constructs a TransitionViewController with the given PresentationController.

  • Method Details

    • listTransitions

      public String[] listTransitions() throws IOException, NotContainsKey
      Retrieves an array of transitions from the presentation controller.
      Returns:
      An array of strings representing the list of transitions.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      NotContainsKey - If the specified key is not found.

    • getWordsFromFile

      public String[] getWordsFromFile(String path) throws IOException
      Retrieves an array of words from the specified text file.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the text file.
      Returns:
      An array of words extracted from the text file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.

    • getFrequenciesFromFile

      public int[] getFrequenciesFromFile(String path) throws IOException
      Retrieves an array of frequencies for each word in the specified text file.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the text file.
      Returns:
      An array of frequencies corresponding to each word in the text file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.

    • addMatrixText

      public void addMatrixText(String alphaKey, String textKey, String text) throws NotContainsKey, ContainsKey, IOException, StringNotInAlphabet, IncorrectType
      Adds a text matrix to the specified alphabet in the presentation controller.
      Parameters:
      alphaKey - The key of the alphabet.
      textKey - The key of the text matrix.
      text - The text matrix to be added.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - If the specified key is not found.
      ContainsKey - If the specified key already exists.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      IncorrectType - If the specified key has an incorrect type.
      StringNotInAlphabet - If the specified word is not in the alphabet.

    • addMatrixWordFrequencyList

      public void addMatrixWordFrequencyList(String wordKey, String alphaKey, int[] frequencies, String[] wordList) throws NotContainsKey, ContainsKey, IOException, IncorrectType, StringNotInAlphabet
      Adds a word frequency list matrix to the specified alphabet in the presentation controller.
      Parameters:
      wordKey - The key of the word frequency list matrix.
      alphaKey - The key of the alphabet.
      frequencies - The array of frequencies.
      wordList - The array of words.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - If the specified key is not found.
      ContainsKey - If the specified key already exists.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      IncorrectType - If the specified key has an incorrect type.
      StringNotInAlphabet - If the specified word is not in the alphabet.

    • deleteTransitionMatrix

      public void deleteTransitionMatrix(String keyTrans) throws NotContainsKey, IOException, FileNotDeleted
      Deletes a transition matrix from the presentation controller.
      Parameters:
      keyTrans - The key of the transition matrix.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - If the specified key is not found.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      FileNotDeleted - If the file cannot be deleted.

    • listAlphabets

      public String[] listAlphabets() throws IOException, NotContainsKey
      Retrieves an array of alphabets from the PresentationController.
      Returns:
      An array of strings representing the list of alphabets.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      NotContainsKey - If the specified key is not found.

    • restart

      public void restart() throws IOException, NotContainsKey
      Restarts the application by initializing the display.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the display initialization.
      NotContainsKey - If a required key is not found during the display initialization. This exception is specific to the application's logic.
